alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 4:14AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, northern Evangeline and southwestern Avoyelles Parishes through 445 AM CST... At 414 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Turkey Creek, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marksville, Bunkie, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Cottonport, Pine Prairie, Mansura, Hessmer, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Bayou Chicot, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Reddell and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 43 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
